machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; -- END GCODE --
G91                         ; relative positioning
T0                          ; Switch to the 1st extruder
G1 F2000 E-10.0             ; retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
T1                          ; Switch to the 2nd extruder
G1 F2000 E-20.0             ; retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G90                         ; absolute positioning
M104 S0 T0                  ; turn off extruder temperature
M104 S0 T1                  ; turn off extruder temperature
M140 S0                     ; turn off heat bed temperature
M106 S0                     ; turn off cooling fan
G1 X2 Y229 F5000            ; move X to min and Y to max
M84                         ; disable motors
; -- end of END GCODE --

machine_start_gcode.default_value:
; -- START GCODE --
G28                     ;home all axes
M114             ;Get Current Position
G1 F200 Z5 
; -- START GCODE --
